healthChecks.name: Checks not yet detected
healthChecks.description: This experiment has not recorded any exposure checks in production yet.

healthChecks.name: Valid unit type not yet verified
healthChecks.description: Exposure checks for this experiment are pending evaluation. This experiment requires exposure checks with unit IDs of type userID

healthChecks.name: Event metric data not yet verified
healthChecks.description: This experiment has recorded no event metric with a valid unit ID yet, or these event metrics are pending evaluation. If you are importing events, this may take up to a day to reflect. This experiment requires metrics with unit IDs of type userID

healthChecks.name: Pulse metrics not yet available
healthChecks.description: Expect to see your Pulse Results within 24 hours. Statsig computes Pulse results on a daily basis.

healthChecks.name: Exposure balance not yet verified
healthChecks.description: Exposure balance for this experiment is pending evaluation. As the experiment records more exposures, Statsig will continue to evaluate experiment exposure balance.
